# `<Images />`

Images defines the images used in Symbol layers.<br/><br/>Use this component to add images to the map style that can be referenced<br/>by symbol layers using the `iconImage` property.

## Props

| Prop                |    Type     | Default | Required | Description                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
| ------------------- | :---------: | :-----: | :------: | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| `images`            |   `shape`   | `none`  | `false`  | Specifies the images in key-value pairs required for the style.<br/>Keys are names used in style expressions (e.g., iconImage).<br/><br/>Values can be:<br/>- A string URL: `"https://example.com/icon.png"`<br/>- A native asset name: `"pin"` (from xcassets on iOS or drawable on Android)<br/>- A require import: `require('./icon.png')`<br/>- An object with uri: `{ uri: 'https://...' }`<br/>- An SDF image: `{ source: require('./icon.png'), sdf: true }`<br/><br/>@example<br/>`tsx<br/><Images<br/>  images={{<br/>    pin: require('./pin.png'),<br/>    marker: 'marker', // native asset<br/>    remote: { uri: 'https://example.com/icon.png' },<br/>    sdfIcon: { source: require('./icon.png'), sdf: true },<br/>  }}<br/>/><br/>` |
| `  [object Object]` |   `union`   | `none`  |  `true`  | FIX ME NO DESCRIPTION                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
| `nativeAssetImages` |   `Array`   | `none`  | `false`  | @deprecated Use the `images` prop with native asset names as string values instead.<br/><br/>If you have an asset under Image.xcassets on iOS and the drawables directory on Android,<br/>you can now specify them directly in the `images` prop:<br/><br/>@example<br/>`tsx<br/>// Before (deprecated):<br/><Images nativeAssetImages={['pin', 'marker']} /><br/><br/>// After:<br/><Images images={{ pin: 'pin', marker: 'marker' }} /><br/>`                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |
| `onImageMissing`    |   `func`    | `none`  | `false`  | Called when a layer references an image that is not present in the style.<br/>You can use this to dynamically add images on demand.<br/><br/>@example<br/>`tsx<br/><Images<br/>  images={images}<br/>  onImageMissing={(imageKey) => {<br/>    setImages(prev => ({ ...prev, [imageKey]: fallbackIcon }));<br/>  }}<br/>/><br/>`<br/>_signature:_`(imageKey:string) => void`                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |
| `children`          | `ReactNode` | `none`  | `false`  | FIX ME NO DESCRIPTION                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
